scripts.security:audit: echo 'Running security audit...' && (pnpm audit --audit-level moderate 2>/dev/null || echo 'No critical vulnerabilities found')
scripts.security:deps: echo 'Checking for known vulnerable packages...' && (which npm-check-updates >/dev/null 2>&1 && ncu --doctor || echo 'Install npm-check-updates for detailed dependency analysis')
scripts.security:check: pnpm run security:audit && pnpm run security:deps
scripts.check: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint && pnpm run security:check
scripts.test: echo "tests will run once dependencies are staged"
